content: Figured y'all would want to know: rustc compiles just fine against LLVM 13, which was branched recently. I'm working on a patch for the first break of the LLVM 14 cycle now.

@durin42 did you see this PR on the rust-lang/rust repository ?
It seems that it indeed compile but doesn't yet works properly due to some regressions.
note that there's also a more specific stream: #t-compiler/wg-llvm
Ah, thanks! Since I'm mostly working on LLVM HEAD stuff at the moment, I assume I should post more in there when it's LLVM interop related?
yeah, it's a better place for LLVM coordination
